Downline.comment: Actual data for DCP downline reports.

Plain.comment: Actual data for downline reports (updated daily, plain tree).

Depth.comment: Depth of the node in the tree.

PersonalVolumes.comment: Compressed value of the PV for the qualified customer.

TeamVolumes.comment: TV value for the qualified customer.

OrganizationalVolumes.comment: OV value for the qualified customer.

UnqualifiedMonths.comment: Number of the last sequentially unqualified months.

Compression.comment: Compressed downline trees with additional calculation data.

OI.comment: Compressed downline tree to calculate Override & Infinity bonuses.

CalculationId.comment: Reference to the related calculation (type 'HYBRID_COMPRESS_FOR_OI' is expected).

Depth.comment: Depth of the node in the tree.

RankId.comment: Reference to the customer's qualification rank.

PersonalVolumes.comment: Compressed value of the PV for the qualified customer.

PersonalVolumesInfinity.comment: All compressed PV used in Infinity bonus.

TeamVolumes.comment: TV value for the qualified customer.

OvLegMax.comment: OV value for the leg with maximal amount.

OvLegSecond.comment: OV value for second leg of the customer.

OvLegOthers.comment: OV value for the lest legs (summary for all other legs).

Pv.comment: PV transfers between customers during phase I compression.

CalculationRef.comment: Reference to the related calculation (type 'HYBRID_COMPRESS_FOR_PTC' is expected).

CustomerFromRef.comment: Reference to the customer who send PV to the ancestor.

CustomerToRef.comment: Reference to the customer who receive PV from the descendant.

PersonalVolumes.comment: PV value been transferred from descendant to the ancestor.

Override.comment: Configuration parameters for override bonus by rank and scheme.

Generation.comment: # of the generation in the compressed tree.

Percent.comment: Percent to apply to calculate override bonus.

Parameter.comment: Common configuration parameters by rank and scheme.

QualifyPv.comment: PV volume to be a qualified customer.

QualifyTv.comment: TV volume to be a qualified customer.

LegMin.comment: Qualification volume for the smallest leg.

LegMedium.comment: Qualification volume for the medium leg.

LegMax.comment: Qualification volume for the largest leg.

Calculation.comment: Relation between downline tree and calculation.

SignUpVolumeDebit.comment: Registry for Sign Up Volume Debit calc.

CalculationRef.comment: Reference to the related calculation (type 'HYBRID_SIGN_UP_DEBIT' is expected).

CustomerRef.comment: Reference to the customer for whom debit was applied.

SaleRef.comment: Reference to the sale order for which bonus was applied.

Downline.comment: Retrospective data for DCP downline reports.

Plain.comment: Retrospective data for downline reports (updated periodically, plain tree).

CalculationRef.comment: Reference to the related calculation (type 'HYBRID_PV_WRITE_OFF' is expected).

CustomerRef.comment: Reference to the customer for whom values were calculated.

UnqualifiedMonths.comment: Number of the last sequentially unqualified months.

Compressed.comment: Retrospective compressed data for DCP downline reports.

CalculationId.comment: Reference to the related calculation (type 'HYBRID_COMPRESS_FOR_PTC' is expected).

Depth.comment: Depth of the node in the tree.

PersonalVolumes.comment: Compressed value of the PV for the qualified customer.

TeamVolumes.comment: TV value for the qualified customer.

OrganizationalVolumes.comment: OV value for the qualified customer.

Depth.comment: Depth of the node in the tree.

PersonalVolumes.comment: PV value for the customer (own or compressed).

UnqualifiedMonths.comment: Number of the last sequentially unqualified months.
